Appendices

List of Major Transactions

In 2022, UTLC ERA made no major transactions.

Legal Compliance: Shareholder Rights

At UTLC ERA, we apply the best industry practices regulating the company’s interaction with the shareholders. Specifically, representatives of the shareholders may be members of UTLC ERA’s corporate bodies and may access the information about the company’s business in accordance with Federal Law No. 208-FZ dated December 26, 1995 On Joint Stock Companies, Federal Law No. 39-FZ dated April 22, 1996 On Securities Market, the Company’s Articles of Association and the Shareholders’ Agreement.

Add the following text: “Based on the audit conducted by the third party auditor, CATR – Auditing Services LLC, to check UTLC ERA’s statements generated according to the International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and the Russian Accounting Standards (RAS), the Company has obtained the positive audit opinions to certify that the financial statements correctly reflect the Company’s financial standing in every material respect as of December 31, 2022, as well as its financial performance and cash flow for the year ending on the specified date”.

Extract from the opinion of the Audit Commission

Based on the audit of the financial and business operations of Joint-Stock Company “United Transport and Logistics Company – Eurasian Rail Alliance” for 2022.

April 28, 2023, Moscow

According to Article 85 of Federal Law dated 26.12.1995 No. 208-FZ On Joint-Stock Companies and the action plan of the Audit Commission of Joint-Stock Company “United Transport and Logistics Company – Eurasian Rail Alliance” approved by the resolution of the Audit Commission (Minutes No. 2 dated March 14, 2023), the Commission composed of: Ye. Stepanyan, Chairman of the Commission, N. Lazuta and A. Kakimov, members of the Commission, conducted a scheduled audit of the financial and business operations of Joint-Stock Company “United Transport and Logistics Company – Eurasian Rail Alliance” (hereinafter referred to as JSC UTLC ERA or the Company) for 2022.

Based on this audit, the Audit Commission confirms the reliability of the data contained in the Company's annual accounting (financial) statements for 2022 and JSC UTLC ERA Annual Report for 2022.
